basic.description: This is the capstone course in the Information Technology degree program. The course provides students with a broad perspective on the information technology field, the skills required to succeed in the field, and a familiarity with emerging technologies. It also allows students to complete their information technology portfolio. The course consists of a combination of discussions of issues in the information technology profession, emerging technologies, and directed work on the student's degree portfolio.
basic.subject: LIS
basic.title: Perspective on Information Technology
